name: Sports Biker Race
description:
You are about to take on the most thrilling Race of your life on this brutal Enclosure where vigilance is order of the day and carelessness is death itself.
Race beyond your imagination and rev up the gas towards enraged enemies.
Race against opponents and destroy them,Boost up your speed like no one else can! Fasten your seat belts. Get ready for the drive of your life!
It's gonna be a tough ride!
* Fantastic graphics
* Precise physics simulation
* Thrilling gameplay
* Easy controls
* Dozens of enemies to destroy
